roleset.name: beat

role.descr: agent: entity giving a beating = winner
domain in which the beating occurs (competition)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: You 'd think they would 've learned from SC - where Mitt did n't open the vaults like he did in Florida and Gingrich whupped him .

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: this must have been what it felt like for dean [the first time]-1 sammy whupped him at wrestling *-1

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Bo Diddley "woulda whupped him with a ugly-stick!"

example.name: arg1
example.text: And his whupping isn't going to come from the president -- it will be from his fellow Republicans.

roleset.note: WHUP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to 'beat.03', 'beat.01'. No VNcls. (from whup.01-v)
WHUPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, whup-v.01. No VNcls. (from whupping.01-n)
